HDG.FS.content: reach speculative when predicate of sentence (being) is made into subject: God is being itself becomes being is God: the meaning of “is” has changed: not a mere reversal, a counter-blow (Gegenstoss) [spirit of revenge in dialectic?], counter-movement (Gegenbewegung) of 2nd “is” upon 1st “is”: Eckhart said Istic-heit, Being is God understood speculatively: Being lets God be God, “is” speaks in transitive/active

HDG.EC.content: [can’t pass judgment on ontology of world-event] devastation comes forth from being, is a world-event (Weltereignis) that beleaguers (umlagert) the earth > person who passes judgment falls prey to quarreling/annoyance that gnaw at him, he becomes slave to self-righteousness (Selbstgerechtigkeit) [Nietzsche on revenge dimming one’s own eyes]
